Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.util.hibernate

Class Summary
HibernateCustomProvider A Custom provider that registers Hibernate optional components: SessionCreator that creates hibernate Session SessionFactoryCreator that creates hibernate SessionFactory from default hibernate.cfg.xml on classpath HibernateTransactionInterceptor that opens a transaction at the beginning of the request, and commits (or rollbacks) that transaction at the end of the request.
HibernateTransactionInterceptor An example of Hibernate Transaction management on VRaptor
SessionCreator Opens and closes a Session from a SessionFactory and provides it to container
SessionFactoryCreator Creates a SessionFactory from default resource /hibernate.cfg.xml, using AnnotationConfiguration, and provides it to container
